document_data.name: Shumokh
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shumokh''' family was an influential mercantile house of [[Eshpurta]] in [[Amn]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: The Shumokhs had traditionally dealt in blacksmithing and armorcrafting, but Lord Bhaem pursued his own interest in [[lute]]-making and built a small fortune doing so.
document_data.Members: * Lord [[Bhaem Shumokh]], the family leader ''circa'' [[1370 DR]] and member of Eshpurta's ruling Shield Council alongside the [[Craumerdaun]], [[Dannihyr]], [[Gheldieg]], [[Keltronn]], and [[Krimmevol]] families.
